47T.F.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
47T.F.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as super savings fund /retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, personal accident, car, and home insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction, hire purchase, and SME lending services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 347 branches under the Somwang brand. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACAP-R.BK.long_name: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited
ACAP-R.BK.summary: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited provides corporate and retail lending services in Thailand and the Asian region. The company operates through Lending and Factoring, Call Center Services and Financial Businesses, and Others segments. It also provides non-performing loan servicing on behalf of client creditors, such as front end customer services to borrowers and carrying out day to day administration and accounting of the recovery process, loans accounts, and asset collateral, as well as NPL portfolio valuation services. In addition, the company offers legal advisory and representation services in the areas of business law, real estate law, civil law, bankruptcy law, tax law, and public sector relations; factoring services; and business process outsourcing services comprising call center, debt and receivables collection, loan approval, payroll, and data entry services. Further, it is involved in the sale of land with buildings and other real estate; and provision of investment banking services. The company was formerly known as ACAP Advisory Public Company Limited and changed its name to ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited in February 2016. ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AE3.SG.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AE3.SG.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Finance Services and Other Business segments. It offers credit card services, hire purchase services, personal loans, and other loans, as well as cash and installment loans. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AEC.BK.summary: AEC Securities Public Company Limited provides securities brokerage services to individual and institutional investors in Thailand. It offers equity services, such as cash account, cash balance account, and credit balance account; securities trading and underwriting; investment advisory; derivatives brokerage; securities borrowing and lending; private fund management; mutual funds; block trade; bonds; securities analysis; and investment banking services, including securities design and offering, debt restructuring, merger, and financial advisory services. The company was formerly known as United Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to AEC Securities Public Company Limited in June 2013. AEC Securities Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1971 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AF-R.BK.summary: AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited provides receivable factoring services to small and middle businesses in Thailand. It offers short-term financing services for various industries, including electronic equipment and parts, telecommunication, consumer products, and health and beauty. The company was formerly known as Dhanamitr Factoring PLC and changed its name to AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited in September 2011. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AIRA Capital Public Company Limited.

AIRA-R.BK.summary: AIRA Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial advisory services in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Securities and Investment, Advisory and Investment Banking, Factoring, and Rental and Service. The company offers securities brokerage, securities trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, derivatives brokerage, and private fund management services. It also provides investment banking services, including mergers and acquisitions, such as asset/company valuation, leverage buyout, and joint ventures and spin-offs; and capital restructurings and other financial advisory services to small and medium-sized enterprises, public and privately-owned companies, government related entities, and private equity firms. In addition, the company provides mergers and acquisitions advisory services, hire purchase, finance lease, and operating lease for industrial equipment and machines; and private fund, mutual fund management, and securities brokerage of investment units services. Further, it engages in receivable factoring, venture capital, property development, and asset management businesses. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMANAH-R.BK.summary: Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited provides hire purchase, financial and operating lease, and inventory finance services to consumers and corporates in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hire Purchase and Others. It also offers used car, auto, and auto SME financing services, as well as auto to money services. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 43 branches. The company was formerly known as Nava Leasing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited in October 2010. Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASK-R.BK.long_name: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited
ASK-R.BK.summary: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited provides auto hire purchase services primarily in Thailand. It operates through five segments: Hire Purchase, Leasing, Loan, Factoring, and Insurance Broker. The company provides automobile hire purchase services for new and used automobiles, including passenger and commercial cars, such as pickup, van, truck and taxi, etc.; auto and machine leasing services for commercial customers; personal loans, sale and hire purchase back, and floor plan financing to hire purchase customers and automotive dealers; and factoring services to commercial customers in various industries. It also offers insurance brokerage services, including car, fire, marine, personal accident, and third party liability insurance to hire purchase and finance lease customers; and auto registrations and transfers, and tax renewal services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chailease Holding Company Limited.

It operates through three segments: Non-Life Insurance Broker, Life Insurance Broker, and Peer-to-Peer Lending Platform Service. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASP.BK.long_name: Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited
ASP.BK.summary: Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company operates in four segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, Fund Management, and Investment Trading. The company provides securities and derivatives brokering and dealing services for local and foreign investors; investment and derivative advisory; security underwriting; securities borrowing and lending; venture capital management; and private, derivatives, and mutual fund management services, as well as act as a financial advisor for the issuance and public offering of securities. It also offers investment banking services, such as mergers and acquisitions advisory, debt and corporate restructuring, and valuation services for shares, as well as invests in unit trusts and buys, sells, and exchanges securities. The company was formerly known as Asia Plus Group Holdings Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited in July 2015. Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AYUD-R.BK.long_name: Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited
AYUD-R.BK.summary: Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Non-life Insurance Business and Investment Business. Its non-life insurance products include motor, fire, and marine and transportation insurance products, as well as miscellaneous insurance products, such as property, liability, engineering, and personal protection, including personal and group accident, domestic and international travel, cancer, micro insurance, burglary, money, machinery and erection, construction, workman compensation, electronics and computers, public liability, all risks, credit card, plate glass, and contractors' plant and machinery insurance products. The company was formerly known as Sri Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited and changed its name to Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited in April 2019. Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Pathumwan, Thailand.

BAM.BK.long_name: Bangkok Commercial Asset Management Public Company Limited
BAM.BK.summary: Bangkok Commercial Asset Management Public Company Limited operates as an asset management company. It purchases non-performing loans (NPLs) from financial institutions in Thailand, including banks and other asset management companies; and manage NPLs through debt restructuring negotiations with debtors to reach optimal solutions for all stakeholders where possible. The company also acquires non-performing assets (NPAs) through various means, such as negotiating with debtors for the transfer of the guarantee or repayment property, foreclosing the debt settlement, and purchasing NPAs directly from other financial institutions. Its NPLs are primarily collateralized by real estate properties, secured by a first priority mortgage; and NPAs are primarily real estate assets, such as empty lands, hotels, factories, commercial buildings, and certain movable assets, as well as residential properties, including detached houses, townhouses, and condominiums. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BAY-R.BK.long_name: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited
BAY-R.BK.summary: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides a range of banking services to individuals, corporates, small and medium-sized businesses, and financial institutions. The company's Retail segment provides a range of banking and related financial services, such as current and savings accounts, fixed deposits, bill of exchange, housing loans, credit cards, personal loans and sale finance loans, hire-purchase and leasing, wealth management, and bancassurance products. Its Commercial segment offers financial services and products, including credit facilities from short term working capital, cash management, trade finance, transactional banking, advisory services, and treasury and money markets products. The company also engages in the provision of refinancing, car rental, personnel, collection, mutual fund, private fund management, asset management, factoring and information technology, life and general insurance brokerage, micro-finance, venture capital, real estate lease, and other financial services, as well as in securities business. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 670 branches in Thailand; 1 branch in Vientiane; and 1 representative office in Myanmar, as well as 6,500 ATMs. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

BBL-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services primarily in Thailand. The company operates through Domestic Banking, International Banking, Investment Banking, and Others segments. It offers various personal banking products and services, including savings, current, fixed deposit, foreign currency, and other accounts; home, personal, and other loans; mutual funds; investments products and services, such as bonds and debentures, as well as securities brokerage services; life and non-life bancassurance products; payment, funds transfer, currency exchange, and SMS services; debit, credit, purchasing, and prepaid cards; and phone and Internet banking, mobile banking, ATMs, and other services. The company also provides business banking products and services comprising operating accounts; loans for SMEs, international trade, investment banking, and e-guarantee services; securities services, such as custodian, mutual fund supervisor, provident fund registrar, securities registrar, and debenture holders' representative services; business loans, payroll, and online banking services; corporate financing services; and merchant and commercial cards. In addition, it offers trade finance, remittances, export and import, project, corporate finance, and advisory services, as well as liquidity, cash, fund, and asset management services. As of December 31,2020, the company operated through a network of 1,128 branches in Thailand; and approximately 300 branches in Cambodia, China, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Japan, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar, the Philippines, Singapore, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, and Vietnam. Bangkok Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BFIT-R.BK.summary: Srisawad Finance Public Company Limited engages in the finance business in Thailand. The company offers money market investment products and services, such as deposit receipts, certificates of deposit, promissory notes, and bills of exchange for individuals, juristic persons, corporate entities, financial institutes, foundations, and associations. It also provides commercial lending and project finance services that comprise commercial loan facilities, such as loans for working capital with various short-term maturities; medium and long term loan facilities to finance expansion or capital expenditures; and aval and guarantee facilities. In addition, the company provides debenture holder representative services; and invests in securities, such as common stocks, government bonds, state enterprise bonds, private bonds, bills of exchange, etc. in primary and secondary markets. The company was formerly known as Bangkok First Investment & Trust Public Company Limited. Srisawad Finance Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

BLA.BK.long_name: Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited
BLA.BK.summary: Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides life insurance services to individuals and corporates in Thailand. Its life insurance products include protection, savings, education, pension, accident plans, total permanent disability, and health and critical illness products. The company also provides general insurance products comprise personal insurance and business all risks insurance products, including fire, motor, burglary, personal accident, accident and personal health, travel accident, cancer, golfer's indemnity, home multicover, medical malpractice liability, bail bond, business interruption, marine, hull, workmen's compensation, money, contractors' plant and equipment, contractors' all risks, erection all risks, boiler and pressure vessel, electronic equipment, industrial all risks, public liability, neon-sign, plate glass, fidelity guarantee, group accident and health, and shop multicover insurance products. In addition, it offers bancassurance products; and equity, long term equity, mixed, foreign investment, fixed income, exchange traded, money market, local fixed income, and retirement mutual funds. Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BROOK-R.BK.long_name: The Brooker Group Public Company Limited
BROOK-R.BK.summary: The Brooker Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in business and financial consulting, and investment activities in Thailand and internationally. The company provides investment banking and financial consulting services, such as mergers and acquisitions, loan refinancing, rehabilitation, and other capital raising on equity and debt securities; planning and negotiations services; and company valuation and advisory services on investments and joint ventures to multinational companies. It also offers capital for growing companies and leveraged buy-outs; and research services, including industrial market research, B2B market survey, customer satisfaction research, industry and trade surveys, market feasibility study, acquisition research, customized market intelligence/in-depth research, and product and service concept/development test. In addition, the company provides real estate consultancy services comprising specialized services in industrial and commercial real estate properties; transaction, advisory, location consulting, asset recovery, and special property services; and disposition and acquisition, advisory and consulting, and property management services. Further, it offers feasibility study, business plan and strategy, company structure and financing, management consultancy, and financial restructuring services for SME firms; and capital management services. CIMBT-R.BK.summary: CIMB Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various banking and financial products and services to individuals and commercial customers in Thailand. It also offers various products and services for small and medium enterprises, including savings, current, and fixed deposits; working capital, commercial, special, and business loans, as well as letters of guarantee; collection and payment services; life, non-life, and group insurance products; cards; and international trade services. LH Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2009 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

MBKET-R.BK.long_name: Maybank Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited
MBKET-R.BK.summary: Maybank Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides investment and securities services to corporate and individual customers in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Securities Business and Investment Banking. The company provides online trading, retail broking, derivatives trading and warrants, offshore trading, mutual funds, and institutional sale services. It also offers investment banking services, such as equity/equity-linked capital market services, including IPO/PO/PP, privatization, listing and going public, dual listings, and listing in Singapore; and debt capital market products comprising Baht debentures, loans, property funds, securitization products, project finance, and structure finance. In addition, the company provides financial advisory services in the areas of mergers and acquisitions, financial partners and/or strategic partners, independent financial advisors, joint ventures, DI fund placement, and debt restructuring. Further, it offers corporate banking, multi-currency cash management, trade financing, transaction banking, and treasury services, as well as new instruments comprising convertible debenture, warrants and options, and derivative products. Additionally, the company provides securities trading, borrowing, and lending; securities and derivatives brokerage; underwriting; investment and wealth management; and block trade services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 30 branches in Bangkok and upcountry. The company was formerly known as Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Maybank Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Maybank Kim Eng Holdings Limited.

NVAU.F.long_name: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited
NVAU.F.summary: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides a range of banking services to individuals, corporates, small and medium-sized businesses, and financial institutions. The company's Retail segment provides a range of banking and related financial services, such as current and savings accounts, fixed deposits, bill of exchange, housing loans, credit cards, personal loans and sale finance loans, hire-purchase and leasing, wealth management, and bancassurance products. Its Commercial segment offers financial services and products, including credit facilities from short term working capital, cash management, trade finance, transactional banking, advisory services, and treasury and money markets products. The company also engages in the provision of refinancing, car rental, personnel, collection, mutual fund, private fund management, asset management, factoring and information technology, life and general insurance brokerage, micro-finance, venture capital, real estate lease, and other financial services, as well as in securities business. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 670 branches in Thailand; 1 branch in Vientiane; and 1 representative office in Myanmar, as well as 6,500 ATMs. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

NVPB.F.long_name: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited
NVPB.F.summary: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services. The company operates through three segments: Retail Banking, Wholesale Banking, and Treasury and Investment. It provides various retail banking products and services, including current, savings, and fixed deposit accounts; time and foreign currency deposits; personal and housing loans; debit, travel, cash and top up, and credit cards; investment services; travel, motor, and home asset insurance products; money transfer, payment and top up, foreign exchange, and overseas education services; and e-banking services. The company also offers SME loans for small and medium businesses; and international business loans. In addition, it provides corporate banking products and services comprising cash management services, such as collection, liquidity management, and transfer and payment services; fixed deposit and current accounts; foreign currency and term deposits; cards; Fx, interest rate, equity, commodity, and credit derivatives; financial advisory services related to merger and acquisition transactions; financial advisory, underwriting, and selling agent services for products offered through the equity capital markets; project finance advisory and feasibility study services, as well as e-banking services; and investment solutions, such as government and corporate bonds, structured notes, and investment units. The company provides its services through a network of branches in Thailand and various centers internationally. Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVPI.F.long_name: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited
NVPI.F.summary: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited provides various financial products and services. It operates in four segments: Corporate, SME, Retail, and Insurance. The company offers deposit products, such as savings, current, fixed deposit, long term deposit, foreign currency, and E passbook deposit accounts; home, car, personal, and mortgage loans; debit, prepaid, and credit cards; investment products comprising mutual funds, debentures, bonds, and other investments; accident, savings, health expense, income protection, heritage and life protection, travel, motor, property, unit linked, and other insurance products; and various payment services. It also provides credit facilities, such as overdrafts, promissory notes, clean bill discounts, long term loans, letter of guarantee, standby letter of credit, and acceptance/Aval; financial advisory and merger acquisition services; fixed income instrument and underwriting services; structured and project finance services; and foreign exchange and interest rate risk management services. In addition, the company offers business collection, business payments, and bank accounts and liquidity management solutions; corporate trust services, including custody, mutual fund supervisor, registrar, escrow agent, security agent, and debenture holder's representative services; international trade remittance, fund transfer, and foreign exchange services; business solutions; and digital banking services. It provides its products and services through its head office and branch network in Thailand; and through its branches in Singapore, Hong Kong, Laos, Vietnam, China, and the Cayman Islands, as well as through its subsidiaries in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, and Myanmar. The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also provides mutual funds products; personal accident, life and health, motor, property, and travel insurance products; wealth banking products; mobile and Internet banking services; trade products and risk management by capital market products; payment, cash collection, and liquidity management services; custodian, fund supervisory, registrar and paying agent, fund accounting, and other agency services; debt capital market, loan arrangement and syndication, debt instrument, and merger and acquisition services, as well as property fund services for public offering; and digital banking, and bancassurance and business protection products. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SINGER-R.BK.summary: Singer Thailand Public Company Limited distributes household electrical and commercial appliances in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Trade sales, Hire purchase and loans, and Service and Others. It offers household electrical appliances, such as sewing machines, sewing needles, general lubricating oils in drip bottles, and scissors; refrigerators, washing machines, gas stoves, and air conditioners; and audio and video products, including flat screen LED TVs, smart TVs, and home theatre systems. The company also provides commercial appliances comprising freezers, beverage coolers, wine cooler cabinets, bakery freezers, and slush ice machines; mobile phone airtime, petrol, and drinking water vending machines; and agricultural equipment and tools, such as water pumps and other products. The company sells its products under the Singer brand name through a network of branch outlets and sales representatives, as well as through debt collectors in Thailand. Singer Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

In addition, the company offers business collection, business payments, and bank accounts and liquidity management solutions; corporate trust services, including custody, mutual fund supervisor, registrar, escrow agent, security agent, and debenture holder's representative services; international trade remittance, fund transfer, and foreign exchange services; business solutions; and digital banking services. It provides its products and services through its head office and branch network in Thailand; and through its branches in Singapore, Hong Kong, Laos, Vietnam, China, and the Cayman Islands, as well as through its subsidiaries in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, and Myanmar. The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TCAP-R.BK.summary: Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Thailand. It operates through six segments: Company, Securities Business, Life Insurance Business, Non-Life Insurance Business, Asset Management Business, and Hire Purchase and Leasing Business. The company offers commercial banking and asset management services; securities brokerage and analysis, proprietary trading, borrowing and lending, and investment and financial advisory services, as well as operates as an underwriter and securities registrar. It also provides non-life insurance products in the areas of fire, automobile, marine and transportation, and miscellaneous; life and health insurance products to individuals, institution clients, and general organizations; hire purchase services for trucks, pick-up cars, taxies, and big bikes; and lending services for cranes, fork lifts, motorcycles, excavators, etc. The company was formerly known as National Finance Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited in April 2006. Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1959 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

In addition, the company provides various products and services for corporate customers, such as cash management solutions, including current, savings, special savings deposit, and fixed deposit accounts, as well as collection, payment, liquidity management, and electronic solutions; international trade solutions comprising import and export, global money transfer, guarantee, and trade finance solutions; working capital loans, term loans, special loans, and letters of guarantee; supply chain financing; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and foreign exchange and derivatives, corporate finance, securities, investment, and business card services. TGH.BK.long_name: Thai Group Holdings Public Company Limited
TGH.BK.summary: Thai Group Holdings Public Company Limited engages in the underwriting of life and non-life insurance business principally in Thailand. The company operates through Life insurance, Non-life insurance, Financial service, and Others segments. It offers life insurance products, including ordinary life insurance, group life insurance, and life insurance and credit protection insurance of financial institutions, as well as non-life insurance products, such as motor insurance. The company also provides property insurance that include fire insurance and all risks insurance; and miscellaneous insurance products comprising burglary insurance, plate glass insurance, money insurance, neon sign and sign board insurance, contractor's all risk insurance, erection all risk insurance, boiler and pressure vessel insurance, electronic equipment insurance, contractors' plant and equipment insurance, machinery breakdown insurance, public liability insurance, directors' and officers' liability, workmen's compensation insurance, fidelity guarantee insurance, bail bond insurance, golfer's indemnity insurance, and other insurance products. In addition, it offers marine and transportation insurance, including accident insurance for individuals and groups, travel insurance, and health insurance, as well as outward treaty and outward facultative reinsurance products. Additionally, the company operates leasing and financing business that provides operating lease for vehicle assets; new car and used car hire purchase services, collateral assets loans, revolving loans, factoring loans, project finance, and others loan services. Further, it develops and rents real estate properties; offers management, consulting, and training services; provides investing consultant; and develops insurance technology. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
